name: Hack N Dance
description:
The game is about the programmer who dancing while coding. Its a fun game to losing up your finger with cool soundtrack from great artist, and beat the number one on online score board.

This game was made as an entry for JamGoJam DNA 9.

JAM STUFF

Criteria #1: Rhythm
Players need to time actions and button presses to a beat of the song to get the highest score.

Criteria #2: Hacker
The char used is a programmer dude

Criteria #3: Synthwave Music
All synthwave song use in the game from Royalty Free Planet.

Criteria #4: Flatulent Sound Effects
The player will farting when missed the beat.

ASSETS

all assets were made during the game jam period, except the background music and fart sound effect

Tools used : Unity, Blender, Photoshop, Fruity Loops and audacity

Free asset used :

short fart sfx
